name: Temple Jewelry
description: ✨ Divine designs meet bridal dreams! Ornate temple jewelry inspired by South Indian heritage, featuring Goddess Lakshmi with majestic elephants. Traditional temple architecture in stunning 22K gold. Where spirituality meets style! 🕉️

name: Kemp Jewellery
description: 💎 Pop of color, burst of tradition! Vibrant ruby and emerald kempu stones dancing in intricate gold settings with pearl accents. South Indian craftsmanship that's both heritage and haute couture! 🔥

name: Antique/Nakshi Jewellery
description: ⏳ Timeless treasures for the modern bride! Burnished vintage finish with intricate Nakshi filigree and heritage motifs. Hand-engraved masterpieces that whisper stories of generations. Old-world charm, new-world appeal! 🎨

name: Thalai Saman
description: 👑 Crown your bridal glory! Complete head ornament collections featuring Netti Chutti, sun-moon symbols, Rakkadi & Jadanagam. Traditional South Indian head jewelry that makes you royalty for the day! ✨

name: Waist and Arm Jewellery
description: 💃 Cinch that silhouette! Elegant Oddiyanum/Vaddanam waist chains and stunning Vanki armlets. Intricate gold work that enhances your bridal curves and adds warrior princess vibes! 🔥

name: Necklaces
description: 💫 Layer it up! From iconic Kaasu Mala gold coin necklaces to multi-layered Harams and elegant chokers. Statement pieces that turn heads and steal hearts! Every neck deserves this level of extra! ✨
